## JwtAuthInfo type

Represents JWT authentication information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type JwtAuthInfo = {
    type: AuthType & AuthType.JWT;
    jwt: string;
    domain: string;
};
```
**References:** [AuthType](./foundation-comms.authtype.md), [AuthType.JWT](./foundation-comms.authtype.md)
